participant_1.name: Lena Schmidt
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, always seeking new experiences.
participant_1.background: i do like watching cooking shows. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. hello i just moved here from germany. i am a vegan and i love hummus.

participant_2.name: Oliver Thompson
participant_2.personality: Reflective and wise, with a zest for life and a love for social gatherings.
participant_2.background: i'm very strong for my age. i remember when nobody had a television. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
